As you well know, in the history of this country, the United States has never defaulted on one penny owed to a creditor. . On February 12, the NBA scoring leader had a league season-high 46 points in a 98-94 loss to the San Antonio Spurs. "When I score 40 points, we've lost," Allen Iverson said. Tonight, we won, and I guess I finally got the monkey off my back. I didn't know what I had until I came out of the game at the end and looked up at the scoreboard. I saw what I had and said,` I hope it doesn't come back to haunt me.' Working primarily against Philadelphia native Kobe Bryant , Allen Iverson shot 17-of-36 from the field.
